name: YellowPad AI Inc.
description: Developer of an AI based legal assistance tool intended to help lawyers automate their lower-level work. The company helps lawyers to easily manage their workloads, streamline their paperwork, save time on tedious tasks and reduce the risk of errors, enabling clients to maintain legal efficiency.
